section.title: images master list of Images
section.para: You can store various types of Images in an database for later reference. For example, you may want to store an Image of your company logo to display on printed Invoices. Users who have been granted the "MaintainImages" privilege will have the ability to load and maintain Images. The following list shows the supported Image formats:

listitem.para:
graphics supported formats
images supported formats Graphics Interchange Format (.gif)

section.para: To access the master list of stored Images, select the "Images" option. The following screen will appear:
The Images master list displays information on all stored Images, including Image name, Image description, and Image file size.
To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for adding a new Image to the master list of stored Images.

Enables you to edit highlighted Image definitions. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Image definition--except that when editing, the fields will contain Image information. Double-clicking on an Image definition will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight an Image definition and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight an Image definition and then select this button to remove the Image from the master list.
